name: LaCure Villas
tag_list: lacure-villas, luxury-villas, luxury-villa-rentals, luxury-vacation-villas, luxury-vacation-rentals, travel, leisure, tourism
overview:
Founded in 1979, LaCure Villas was North America’s first Luxury Villa rental company. LaCure provides exceptional and unique vacation experiences to discerning individuals. With a portfolio that spans 5 continents and 29 countries, LaCure has one of the finest selections of privately owned rental properties worldwide. It’s inventory of over 1000 individual properties includes Caribbean seaside hideaways, European ski chalets, French Chateaus, Italian villas and Borgos, private villa-spas, not to mention exclusive country estates, castles, private islands and more. 

In addition to luxury vacation rentals, LaCure also specializes in corporate retreats, destination weddings, family reunions, incentive travel and other gatherings. They have a wide variety of unique venues worldwide suitable for all sorts of large and medium scale events.
